sentence.value: Aleksandr Nikolayevich Balandin (????????? ?????????? ????????) (born July 30, 1953 in Fryazino, Moscow Oblast, Russian SFSR) is a Russian cosmonaut.

sentence.value: He is married with two children.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: He is married with two children.

sentence.value: He was selected as a cosmonaut on December 1, 1978, and retired on October 17, 1994.

sentence.value: He worked at NPO Energia until 1994, and was then President of Lendint-Association until 2000.
